definition[0]: a small piece of something solid, without a particular shape
example[0]: Strain the custard to remove lumps.

definition[1]: a small hard swollen area that sticks out from someone’s skin or grows in their body, usually because of an illness
example[2]: You should never ignore a breast lump.
definition[2]: a small square block of sugar
